title: Transfering pictures from Picasa
content: Since the new update 2025/06/18 I can no longer transfer pictures from Picasa3 to my email is there a solution? This just happened after the 06/18 installation.
creator: tom_stauffer

title: Encountering 10 -15 minute delay in receiving emails in Thunderbird via Yahoo mail
content: 'Encountering 10 -15 minute delay in receiving emails in Thunderbird via Yahoo mailbold text. My ISP is Cox communications and with their conversion to Yahoo, using Thunderbird to view emails has not been timely.
creator: dpaged

title: thunderbird migration from windows 10 to windows 11
content:
I've moved thunderbird between windows 10 computers several times without any issues in the past, but I'm having problems now.

My old PC is running windows 10 with the most up to date TB. New machine has windows 11.

In the past, it was just a case of installing TB on the new machine and replacing the profile folder there with the one from the old machine.

Now when I do this I get "your thunderbird profile could not be loaded. It may be missing or inaccessible"

Ay help with this woould be much appreciated
creator: firefoxsync48
